mdRecord.dcterms:title: Epistre consolatoire, et vers lugubres sur la mort pitoyable de deffunct monsieur maistre François Hurault, Conseiller du Roy, & Maistre des requestes ordinaire de son hostel, viuant, Seigneur de Lay & de Chasteaupers / a tres-sage & vertueuse dame Madame de Chasteaupers sa femme
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Popule.
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Signatures: A-B⁴ C² (leaf C2 is blank)

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Chambolle-Duru. Unidentified armorial binding, with crest and monogram "RB" or "BR" inside both covers, with motto "In via nulla in via." Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 624.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hurault, François, -approximately 1590
